## ShortcutManager class

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use {  KeyboardManager<!-- -->} instead.
> 

Register shortcut keys.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ShortcutManager extends ManagerTool 
```
**Extends:** ManagerTool
